suggest.meta_keywords: DNSSEC, Azion Edge platform, IP address conversion, Domain Name System, DNS security, DNS tampering prevention, DNSSEC activation, digital signatures DNS, DNS data integrity, DNS hosting
suggest.meta_description: Explore how Azion's Edge platform supports DNSSEC for secure and reliable DNS data integrity and prevention against tampering, ensuring authentic IP address conversions.

current.meta_description: Azion's Edge platform is compliant with the DNS Security Extensions (DNSSEC) specification supporting its use in Azion's accelerated sites and applications.
